tool_description: Performs final comprehensive validation of documents, certificates, and signing environment before digital signature application to prevent signing failures.

document_path.description: Path to document ready for signing

signature_field_id.description: ID of signature field to use for signing

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

timestamp_server.description: URL of timestamp server for timestamping

error_messages: Document not ready: Document validation failed - cannot proceed with signing.
Certificate invalid: Signing certificate is expired, revoked, or otherwise invalid.
Signature field unavailable: Specified signature field is not available or already signed.
Compliance failure: Document does not meet required compliance standards.
Timestamp server unreachable: Cannot connect to specified timestamp server.
Validation level error: Specified validation level is not supported.
Missing required fields: Required document fields or metadata are missing.
usage: Provide document_path and certificate_path for signing readiness validation. Configure signing parameters including signature_field_id, signing_reason, and compliance_standards. Set validation_level for appropriate strictness.

ready_to_sign.description: Whether document is ready for digital signing

estimated_signature_size.description: Estimated size of digital signature in bytes
